Text: Du är en pärla JanOve2011, stort tack
Thank you v much.  Can anyone explain why there is only one subtitle file for all languages and how do I extract the English subtitles?

@ carbuild, 
Härligt att du gillar det :)

@ LostJack09,
I don't know what player you use, but in the open source cross-platform multimedia player "VLC" from videolan you just enter the menus and choose the language. Standard in all decent players nowadays I guess. In VLC you can also set a specific language as default, very neat. Have a lookie :)
